column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Street side cafe with a order and sit kinda deal. The cafe is a decent size but it does have a lot of tables/chairs which is good except that it can get crowded at peak hours. Small attached patio great for dogs to chill out while you eat
column2: but the patio also can get crowded very easily. At any point we saw at least 2-3 dogs with us
column3: including our own. Tried the pistachio croissant which was an interesting combination and one that I haven't had before. Good cappuccino! Their quiche was great too. The food is slightly above the usual price you would pay for cafe food.
